#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Domain Values for media-type

= Introduction =

The media-type attribute is limited to a list of valid values. This document defines the lists of valid values of the media-type attributes.

== Media Types ==

Media attached to GolfCourse or [Hole] or Player contain a `type` attribute that qualify the content of the media. Valid values for the Media type attribute are:

 # photograph
 # yardage-page
 # yardage-book
 # map
 # scorecard


= Note =
